summary: Makes the horns on the dragon bone helmet made of bone instead of metal.
descriptionHtml:
The horns on the dragon bone helmet allways bothered me.

so i made them look more like bone

instal
place data folder inside skyrim.
merge folders if asked.

uninstal
remove file dragonbonehelmet.dds  located in skyrim/data/textures/armor/dragonbone

my other mods
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3708
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16832/
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3118
and some other ones

all credit goes to my favorite game company
bethesda!
author: hellstorm102
